resources.string: Please feel free to contact us and mail us your valuable feedback @ info@slabs.tech .

The features provided by the system includes a story narrator which reads fables and short-stories , it also includes a pronounciation tutor- which allows the user to proceed to next word only after the correct utterance of the word. The striking feature of the app is be the virtual slate, it helps the user to learn different alphabets by tracing them on the screen.
click the menu button for information on how to change language and speed
To change language when audio is being played, click the stop button so that the audio output stops.Next click on the menu button ,then click the language button and select the required language
To change speed when audio is being played, click the stop button so that the audio output stops.Next click on the menu button. then click on the speed button and select the required rate of speed

string-array.name: experienceList
string-array.item: Kittur Rani Chennamma : The Divine Warrior Female Force
the Utsav Rock Garden : Be amazed at the magic of handcrafted rock artifacts
Serene Unkal Lake : Take joy boat ride in the calm waters of Unkal Lake
Siddharudha Matha : Meditate amidst the serene setting of Siddharudha Math
Nrupatunga Betta : Walk/Pedal With Family and connect to nature
Gangubhai Hangal Memorial : The voice that lifted countless hearts
KLETECH Night Water fountain : Where Science Meets Art aka The Prestige
Mystery of Durgadbail : Our Very Own Diagon Alley
Chandramouleshwara Temple : Time Travel to a place built 900 years ago
Akshay Patra : ISKCON : Gods at Work : Feeding millions of School Going Kids

The South Chimney : Delicacies of the deccan multi-cuisine served on Banana leaves
The Silver Culture : Handcrafted silver art for the Diva in You
The Cashew Factory : Hands-on Tour of Cashew Industry : Charlie and The Chocolate Factory
